select ht.id,c.city as startCity,d.city as endCity, ht.startCity_id,ht.endCity_id, ht.startTime,ht.endTime,ht.price,tc.companyName from hualing_track ht,t_company tc,cities c , (select * from cities) d, (select * from provinces) f, provinces p where ht.company_id=tc.companyId and ht.startCity_id=c.cityid and ht.endCity_id=d.cityid and c.provinceid=p.provinceid
and p.provinceid in (350000,440000,450000)
and p.provinceid in (310000,320000,330000)
and p.provinceid in (360000,420000,430000)
and p.provinceid in (110000,120000,130000)
and p.provinceid in (510000,520000)
and p.provinceid in (210000,230000,220000)
and p.provinceid in (610000,620000,640000)
and d.provinceid=f.provinceid

select ht.startCity_id,ht.endCity_id,tc.companyName,c.city as startCity,d.city as endCity from hualing_track ht,t_company tc,cities c,(select * from cities) d where ht.company_id=tc.companyId and ht.startCity_id=c.cityid and ht.endCity_id=d.cityid and ht.startCity_id=#{h.startCity_id}
